import { useContext } from "react" import { ShopContext } from "../Context/ShopContext" export const Values = () =>{ const { priceProducts } = useContext(ShopContext) let percentual = 0.10; let aumento = priceProducts * percentual; let novoPreco = priceProducts - aumento; console.log(novoPreco) return(

Resumo do Pedido

R$: {priceProducts}

Entrega

R$: {priceProducts}

Cupom de desconto

R$: {priceProducts}

Total

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {novoPreco}

Valor com 10% de desconto no Boleto ou PIX

) }
